name: Hollywood
description: Glossy, high-production narrative film look with epic scale and star power.
key_features: Dramatic lighting; seamless editing; golden hour key light; rim glow.
motion: Smooth 60fps; steady tracking shots; crane shots; orbiting dolly zooms.
lighting: Bright dramatic lights; triumphant atmosphere; cinematic glamour.
camera: Epic scale framing; tracking and crane shots; dolly zooms.
rendering: 8K ray-traced; high-fidelity CGI blend; 4K realistic motion.
use_cases: Blockbuster movies; action epics; high-end advertising.

prompts.base: Epic battle in ancient Rome, Hollywood style, bright dramatic lights, steady tracking shot, heroic mood, 4K realistic motion.
prompts.cinematic: Gladiator arena clash with thousands extras, Hollywood blockbuster, golden hour key light rim glow, crane shot rising over chaos, triumphant atmosphere, 8K ray-traced, smooth 60fps.
prompts.stylized: Coliseum warriors in hyper-saturated colors, Hollywood glamour filter, orbiting dolly zoom, epic orchestral vibe, high-fidelity CGI blend.

negative_prompt: Avoid negative phrasing (no camera movement, no clouds); avoid conversational commands.
style_modifiers: 8K ray-traced; golden hour; rim glow; crane shot.
failure_modes: Vague conceptual language reduces quality; command-based prompts lack detail.

name: Noir
description: Shadowy crime drama aesthetic with high contrast and fatalistic mood.
key_features: Chiaroscuro lighting; wet reflections; venetian blinds shadows; silhouettes.
motion: Slow pan; Dutch angle tracking; vertigo spin.
lighting: Low-key lighting; moody tension; existential haze; flickering streetlamps.
camera: Dutch angles; tracking shots; silhouette framing.
rendering: Grainy film stock; sharp HD; stylized monochrome with color pops.

prompts.base: Detective in rainy alley, noir style, shadowy low-key light, slow pan, moody tension, HD sharp.
prompts.cinematic: Hard-boiled PI under neon signs, classic film noir, chiaroscuro lighting wet reflections, Dutch angle tracking, fatalistic dread, 4K grainy film stock.
prompts.stylized: Silhouette gumshoe chase, noir ink wash, flickering streetlamp strobes, vertigo spin, existential haze, stylized monochrome with color pops.

negative_prompt: Avoid phrases like 'no light' or 'no color' (use 'chiaroscuro' or 'monochrome' instead).
style_modifiers: chiaroscuro; grainy film stock; Dutch angle; wet reflections.
failure_modes: Loss of shadow detail in low-res generation.

name: Cyberpunk
description: High-tech dystopia characterized by neon grids and rain-slick urban environments.
key_features: Neon grids; holograms; chrome reflections; vivid colors (pink, cyan); rain-slick streets.
motion: Fast fly-through; bullet-time dash cam; glitch-fused motion.
lighting: Neon drench; lens flares; gritty mood; high contrast.
camera: Fast camera movement; dash cam perspectives; close-ups on tech.

prompts.base: Neon hacker in megacity, cyberpunk style, chrome reflections, fast fly-through, gritty mood, 4K high contrast.
prompts.cinematic: Blade Runner streets pulse, cyberpunk neon drench, lens flares rain-slick, bullet-time dash cam, dystopian pulse, ray-traced 8K.
prompts.stylized: Glitch-fused cyborg swarm, vaporwave cyber, holographic distortions warp, epileptic strobe chase, post-human ecstasy.

name: Kinetic Neo-Constructivism
description: Treats the frame as a site for constructed objects utilizing geometric strings and linear structural elements to define volume.
key_features: Geometric lines; linear strings; high-contrast industrial textures; steel and glass surfaces; structural clarity.
motion: Camera movement around the object creates the illusion of life; orbital paths; parallax-driven motion.
lighting: Hard side lighting (5600K); sharp shadows; specularity on glass surfaces; industrial coldness.
camera: Orbit shots circling the subject; 360-degree rotation; consistent distance tracking.
rendering: 8K resolution; Ray Tracing; global illumination; no motion blur.
origin: Emergence of dedicated 3D generation tracks in AI film festivals (2024-2025).
use_cases: Abstract product demos; experimental architecture; title sequences.

prompts.base: A central monolith composed of interlinking steel strings and glass perspects, Neo-Constructivist sculpture, industrial texture, high-contrast monochrome.
prompts.cinematic: Cinematography Orbit shot circling the subject at a consistent distance, 360-degree rotation. Lighting Hard side lighting at 5600K, sharp shadows, specularity on glass surfaces.
prompts.stylized: Kinetic Neo-Constructivism style, geometric line art, orbiting camera, industrial aesthetic.
prompts.experimental: Monolith constructed of light strings and transparent perspects, orbiting camera, ray tracing.

negative_prompt: organic shapes; soft edges; motion blur; hand-painted textures; natural lighting.
style_modifiers: ray tracing; steel strings; geometric; high-contrast; 5600K.
failure_modes: Clashes with rough/organic textures which obscure high-fidelity depth; clutters when paired with high-frequency maximalism.

name: Anthropocene Glitch Surrealism
description: Uses digital errors and pixelation to symbolize the fragility of natural ecosystems under climate pressure.
key_features: 8-bit fragmentation; hazy gradients; machine-generated textures; neon-plant hybrids; swirling organic patterns.
motion: 8-bit creatures fluttering; rhythmic swaying of plants; surreal morphing effects.
lighting: Warm sunset key light (3000K); multicolored neon reflections on wet surfaces; magical surreal glow.
camera: Macro close-up on textures transitioning to wide environment shots.
rendering: Pixelated text overlays; digital distortion effects; color channel separation; glitch art aesthetic.
origin: Response to 'AI slop' and climate anxiety (2025-2026).
use_cases: Climate awareness campaigns; avant-garde social media; experimental filmmaking.

prompts.base: A Siamese cat stretching on a velvet couch that is slowly fragmenting into pixels, Digital decay, psychedelic nature, vibrant orange and teal palette.
prompts.cinematic: Cinematography Macro close-up on fur transitioning to a wide shot. Lighting Warm sunset key light at 3000K, multicolored neon reflections on wet floor surfaces.
prompts.stylized: Anthropocene Glitch style, neon plants, digital decay, 8-bit fragmentation, earthy color schemes.
prompts.experimental: Surreal morphing where elements transform gradually into unexpected shapes while maintaining visual flow, Anthropocene Glitch.

negative_prompt: clean lines; HD realism; traditional nature photography; no distortion.
failure_modes: Harsh edges of pixels clash with soft watercolor textures; can result in 'visual slop' if patterns lack underlying structure.

name: Spectral Phantasmagoria
description: A textured, misty environment where light is treated as a narrative character, utilizing translucent patterns and ethereal outlines.
key_features: Misty overlays; translucent steam; ornate cathedral linework; bioluminescence; textured shadows.
motion: Steam rising slowly in wispy patterns; gentle handheld camera shake; subtle drift.
lighting: Deep moonlight (8000K); volumetric 'God rays'; Gobo projections (venetian blinds); ethereal mystery.
camera: Slow dolly forward; low angle looking up; shallow depth of field.
rendering: 35mm film grain; high contrast; chiaroscuro effects; ray tracing.
origin: Reaction against 'flatness' of early AI generations; improved volumetric lighting controls (2025).
use_cases: Supernatural mysteries; high-fashion editorials; horror films.

prompts.base: A gothic cathedral interior with ornate cathedral-inspired linework, Spectral Noir, phantasmagoria, ethereal mystery.
prompts.cinematic: Cinematography Slow dolly forward through the nave, low angle looking up. Lighting Dramatic cold night, 8000K deep moonlight blue, volumetric 'God rays' from stained glass.
prompts.stylized: Spectral Phantasmagoria style, misty overlays, deep moonlight, textured shadows, gothic cathedral.
prompts.experimental: Shadow texture using Gobo projection of venetian blinds, 8000K light piercing through smoke.

negative_prompt: High-key lighting; flat illumination; cheerful colors; commercial look; no shadows.
style_modifiers: volumetric rays; 8000K; Gobo projection; misty; gothic.
failure_modes: Loss of narrative power when brightness is too high; requires intentional darkness.

name: Neo-Brutalist Minimalism
description: Raw, unfinished design emphasizing bold contrasts, geometric blocks, and functional aesthetics over traditional beauty.
key_features: Raw geometric blocks; chunky overlapping letters; stark shadows; monochrome with one accent color; rough textures.
motion: Static or precise mechanical movements; no fluid transitions.
lighting: High contrast; harsh lighting; industrial atmosphere; raw and unfinished feel.
camera: Geometric framing; direct front-on shots; asymmetry.
rendering: Visible digital glitches; deliberate crudeness; attention-grabbing typography.
origin: Counterbalance to AI maximalism and roots in 1950s brutalism.
use_cases: Tech startup branding; modern lifestyle reels; posters.

prompts.base: Neo-brutalist style, raw geometric blocks, chunky overlapping letters, stark shadows, monochrome with electric blue accent.
prompts.stylized: Neo-brutalism design, rough design elements, asymmetry, attention-grabbing typography, vibrant color contrast.
prompts.experimental: Industrial minimalism, visible digital glitches, raw unrefined forms.

negative_prompt: dreamy pastel gradients; soft edges; ornate details; fluid motion; elegance.
style_modifiers: raw; geometric; chunky typography; high contrast; industrial.
failure_modes: Clashes with ethereal or calm aesthetics; patterns become messy if too many details compete.

name: Impressionism (AI Pastiche)
description: Replicates 19th-century oil painting techniques focusing on the play of light and color through visible, spontaneous brushstrokes.
key_features: Short visible brushstrokes; rough textures; muted and earthy tones; absence of sharp light-and-shadow effects.
motion: Captures the transient nature of scenes; sense of spontaneity and movement.
lighting: Overcast day lighting; serene yet melancholic atmosphere; focus on atmospheric effects rather than detail.
camera: Expansive perspective; high horizon line; broad view of foreground and middle ground.
rendering: Painterly textures; soft blended tonality; avoidance of digital exactness.
origin: Modeled after 19th-century masters like Claude Monet and Camille Pissarro.
use_cases: Fine art replication; digital storytelling; historical themes.

prompts.base: Detailed coastal landscape painting in the Impressionist style movement of the 19th century. Short, visible brushstrokes, play of light and color, muted and earthy colors.
prompts.stylized: Serene painting of an alpine pasture, impressionism style, second half of 19th century, visible rough brushstrokes.
prompts.experimental: Overcast coastal scene, Impressionism technique, capturing the essence of movement and transience.

negative_prompt: hyperrealism; sharp details; highly saturated colors; digital exactness; photographic quality.
style_modifiers: short brushstrokes; visible texture; muted colors; 19th century.
failure_modes: AI often introduces hyperrealistic textures (overly sharp skin/pores) or photographic lighting that contrasts with painterly intent.

name: Liminal Spaces Film
description: Eerie, empty architecture and non-places creating a sense of nostalgic unease.
key_features: Infinite beige voids; carpeted rooms; fluorescent lights; empty hallways; no actors.
motion: Slow creep forward; perpetual dolly drift; nauseous fisheye loop.
lighting: Fluorescent hum flicker; pooling shadows; eerie isolation; nostalgic unease.
camera: Slow push-in; dolly drift; fisheye lens; claustrophobic framing.
rendering: Ray-traced desaturation; analog TV static; glitch distortions.
origin: Internet culture (Backrooms creepypasta); indie horror experiments.
use_cases: Indie horror; art installations; social media horror content.

prompts.base: Endless office hallways empty, liminal spaces style, buzzing fluorescent, slow creep forward, eerie isolation, HD uncanny.
prompts.cinematic: Infinite carpeted voids hum, backrooms aesthetic, pooling shadows flicker, perpetual dolly drift, nostalgic unease, ray-traced desaturation.
prompts.stylized: Glitch-trapped hotel corridors warp, liminal hum distortion, analog TV static bleeds, nauseous fisheye loop, existential void fever.

style_modifiers: liminal hum; fluorescent flicker; beige palette.

name: Constructivism
description: Art as engineering using industrial materials and three-dimensional drawing in space.
key_features: Industrial materials (perspex, nylon filament); strings creating space; non-static forms; geometric precision.
motion: Visual motion through viewer perspective change; reflecting strings; dynamic intersection of lines.
lighting: Material reflections; industrial and contemporary mood.
camera: 3D thinking; moving around the piece to see directional changes.
rendering: Object-based construction; avoidance of carving or incising.

prompts.base: Constructivist sculpture using nylon strings and perspex, industrial engineering style, geometric lines.
prompts.cinematic: Inferred: Macro shot of nylon filaments reflecting light in a perspex constructivist installation, 3D spatial drawing, industrial aesthetic.

style_modifiers: nylon filament; industrial materials; spatial construction.
